`<julian>`

#### About me

Computer science graduate working as an IT manager at P&G. I love animals and have been a proud rabbit foster papa [[üêá](https://kroliki.net/pl/)] for a few good years now. I like to make silly, sometimes useful apps and I'm a huge fan of open source and sharing. I dabble in gamedev [[üéÆ](https://julzerinos.itch.io/)] as a hobby. I have an unhealthy obsession with peanut butter.
